oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Red Foley - Pontiac Auditions - '2' and '3'
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Red Foley Pontiac audition recordings for WSM, Nashville, TN, labeled as audition numbers 2 and 3 (see also TR000872_2 ). Featuring the Pontiac Quintet and Pontiac Quartet in audition 2 and 3 respectively.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Pontiac Quintet; Pontiac Quartet

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Pontiac automobile; Foley, Red, 1910-1968
